attributes.action: Prosecute those responsible for knowingly misleading the electorate.
attributes.background:
During the the lead up to the recent referendum certain facts pertaining to the effects leaving the EU would have on the UK people, services and economy.
It has now been brought to light that these facts were knowingly false and used to mislead the electorate in this referendum.

rejection.details: Decisions to prosecute people are not taken by the Government or Parliament.
